## Learning Outcomes {.ch}

After completing Class 15 you should...

* Know the definition/defining equation for implicit ATE and coupled equations
* Understand when an unknown initial value or constant appears in IVODE reactor design equations, an implicit ATE must be added to the design equations
* Be able to
    * write an implicit ATE for calculating an unknown initial value or constant in the BSTR design equations
    * solve design equations consisting of coupled ATEs and IVODEs numerically
